original_text: they ought to be here before you and to make an accusation, should they have anything against me.
korean_text: 그들이 만일 나를 반대할 사건이 있으면 마땅히 당신 앞에 와서 고발하였을 것이요

sentences.original_text: they ought to be here before you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신 앞에 와 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: should they have anything against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 나를 고소할 일이 있다면
